description.value:
Wondrous item, rare (requires attunement by a bard)
This flute is carved with skulls and can be used as a spellcasting focus. If you spend 10 minutes playing the flute over a dead creature, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.I2LUSF5ogc7Bj62e]{speak with dead} spell from the flute. The flute canâ€™t be used this way again until the next dawn.
